system.description:
You shout so loud that it throws your opponents off - a classic tactic.

Spend 1 Beat and blast all enemies in blast 3 wide open and slow them.

Soul-Breaking Screech: Spend 2 Beats. Instead stun all enemies in burst 2.

Soul Piercing Strike: Spend 3 Beats: attack a single fighter in range 6 with Bravery afterwards. If the attacker is exactly 6 tiles away, they are stunned, blown wide open, and their defenses suffer -1d until the end of their next riff.
